nodes.text: Star Wars Blueprints: The Classic Trilogy

Star Wars Blueprints: The Classic Trilogy is a hardcover reference book published by Dorling Kindersley in 2012 as part of the Star Wars: The Complete Vehicle Cross-Sections and Blueprints box set. The text serves as a compendium of the previously published works Star Wars Blueprints: The Ultimate Collection (2008) and Star Wars Blueprints: Rebel Edition (2010).
